verses.name: Acts 26:19
verses.text: Whereupon, O king Agrippa, I was not disobedient unto the heavenly vision:

verses.name: Acts 26:20
verses.text: But shewed first unto them of Damascus, and at Jerusalem, and throughout all the coasts of Judea, and then to the Gentiles, that they should repent and turn to God, and do works meet for repentance.

verses.name: Acts 26:21
verses.text: For these causes the Jews caught me in the temple, and went about to kill me.

verses.name: Acts 26:22
verses.text: Having therefore obtained help of God, I continue unto this day, witnessing both to small and great, saying none other things than those which the prophets and Moses did say should come:
